DOC.brief_title: Proper Pressure Duration Sustained Lung Inflation Preterm Infants
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize prospective pilot study Mansoura University Hospital case follow Neonatal Intensive Care Unit Mansoura University Children Hospital , Mansoura , Egypt . Preterm infant bear equal less 32 week gestation respiratory distress syndrome include study . We aim study proper pressure duration sustain lung inflation delivery room . Preterm infant divide 5 group : 1 . Group 1 ( Control group ) . In group preterm infant treat sustained lung inflation stead receive regular respiratory care 2 . Group 2 ( High pressure long duration group ) . Preterm infant group treat sustained lung inflation pressure 20 cm H2O 20 second 3 . Group 3 ( High pressure short duration group ) . Preterm infant group treat sustained lung inflation pressure 20 cm H2O 10 second . 4 . Group 4 ( Low pressure long duration group ) . Preterm infant group treat sustained lung inflation pressure 15 cm H2O 20 second . 5 . Group 5 ( Low pressure short duration group ) . Preterm infant group treat sustained lung inflation pressure 15 cm H2O 10 second Sustained lung inflation deliver use T - piece ventilator ( Neopuff infant resuscitator ; Fisher & Paykel , Auckland , New Zealand ) . All preterm infant respiratory distress follow follow step neonatal resuscitation 1 . All infant receive initial care include provide warmth , clear airway , dry stimulate infant . 2 . After initial step , pulse oximetry initiate determine oxygen saturation guide require FIO2 . 3 . Infants intervention group receive single single maneuver sustain lung inflation first breath accord study group . 4 . Continuous positive airway pressure pressure 5 cm H2O FIO2 30 % delivered infant control group immediately initial step resuscitation infant intervention group single maneuver sustain lung inflation . 5 . Positive pressure ventilation provide uring T-piece resuscitator infant inadequate respiratory effort heart rate < 100 beat per minute rate 40 60 time per minute 30 second , heart rate measure . 6 . Oxygen therapy titrate keep pre-ductal saturation 90-95 % . 7 . Endotracheal intubation provide positive pressure ventilation ineffective , prolong apnea , chest compression require . 8 . Chest compression require infant 's heart rate remain < 60 bpm despite adequate ventilation 30 second . 9 . Surfactant administered preterm infant require fraction inspire oxygen 40 percent high maintain oxygen saturation 90 percent remain apneic . 10 . Mechanical ventilation initiate preterm infant respiratory acidosis document arterial pH < 7.2 PaCO2 > 60 65 mmHg , hypoxia document arterial PaO2 < 50 mmHg despite FiO2 exceed 40 percent nasal continuous positive airway pressure , severe apnea . The primary outcome study need endotracheal intubation delivery room . Secondary outcome include need surfactant therapy , need endotracheal intubation mechanical ventilation within 72 hour birth , duration mechanical ventilation oxygen support , development air leak syndrome , length hospital stay , bronchopulmonary dysplasia , necrotising enterocolitis , intraventricular haemorrhage , retinopathy prematurity , neonatal mortality hospital discharge , . Broncho alveolar lavage perform endotracheally intubated infant enrol study measure level IL-10 lung inflammatory marker immediately birth ( basal ) 12 hour birth ( follow ) .
